headline: Virus Spreads As World Pays For Dictator Xi
abstract: Xi used his tight rule to control information rather than to stop an epidemic.
lead_paragraph: Chinaâ€™s leaders sometimes seem 10 feet tall, presiding over a political and economic juggernaut that has founded universities at a rate of one a week and that recently used more cement in three years than the United States did in the entire 20th century.
